body_html: Well that requires some complicated bookkeeping because now you not only need to associate a stream with every function, but you also need to track their lifetime. How expensive is it to change streams?
body_text: Well that requires some complicated bookkeeping because now you not only need to associate a stream with every function, but you also need to track their lifetime. How expensive is it to change streams?
body: Well that requires some complicated bookkeeping because now you not only need to associate a stream with every function, but you also need to track their lifetime. How expensive is it to change streams?
